name: Shooter in the dark
description:
You were trapped in a room with only a gun, a flashlight, and a BUTT LOAD of ammo, you're going to have to survive waves of enemies, but as you progress, the lights will turn off !

Tips : Each door makes a different sound so you can know where the enemies come from, and the sounds are 3D, so it's easier to play with headphones.

Controls : Left click to shoot, right click to throw flares (picked up on certain enemies).

Don't hesitate to send some feedback !
